bio: I build systems to explore data in immersive environments. My work focuses on the development of virtual reality (VR) applications and high-performance computer graphics systems. I am currently working towards my PhD in Computer Science at VIDi Labs with my advisor Kwan-Liu Ma. Before moving to the U.S., I was engaged in multiple projects with topics ranging from cryptocurrencies to deep learning. After graduating from the Vienna University of Technology under Eduard Gröller I worked with ImageBiopsy Lab for about a year. After that I decided to join Kwan-Liu Ma at his VIDi Design Lab at UC Davis.
